name: Campaignion
description: Campaignion is an internal web application I built to standardize and expedite the workflow documentation process in Adobe Campaign. It parses browser HTML and generates a numbered workflow with description tables that can be exported to Word.
tools: Tools Used: JavaScript, React Spectrum, Adobe I/O Runtime, HTML/CSS

name: Adobe's Playful Palette
description: For my senior design project, I re-implemented Adobe's Playful Palette, an interactive parametric color mixer for digital artists. You can blend color blobs to create gradients and easily recolor strokes with an infinite history.

name: The New York Times
description: As a Graphics intern on the Immersive Storytelling team, I prototyped 3-D assets to visualize AR moments, researched and tested emerging technologies like the Microsoft Hololens, and contributed graphics in the articles below. I also styled and contributed to UI functionality in our intern-led 3-D Crossword project built using Three.js.
tools: Tools Used: Maya, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Sketchfab
